description:
Every Tinder-style interface lets you go back one card. With keyboard and buttons making accidental swipes easy, this is a real usability gap.

Implementation:

2. Add "Undo" button (‚Ü© icon) to action buttons row
3. On undo: animate previous card back in from exit position, restore it to stack
4. Only allow undoing the last 1 card (not unlimited history)
5. Disable undo button when history is empty
6. Decrement the appropriate score counter on undo

Consider: keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Z or U key) for undo

title: Establish spacing scale and fluid typography system
description:
13 distinct arbitrary spacing values used across templates with no system. Typography has one breakpoint override where h1 jumps 43%.

Spacing scale (add to :root in base.html):
--space-1: 0.25rem; (4px)
--space-2: 0.5rem;  (8px)
--space-3: 0.75rem; (12px)
--space-4: 1rem;    (16px)
--space-6: 1.5rem;  (24px)
--space-8: 2rem;    (32px)
--space-12: 3rem;   (48px)
--space-16: 4rem;   (64px)

Fluid typography (replace static sizes + breakpoint override):
h1 { font-size: clamp(1.75rem, 1.25rem + 2.5vw, 2.5rem); }
h2 { font-size: clamp(1.25rem, 1rem + 1.25vw, 1.5rem); }
.subtitle { font-size: clamp(0.95rem, 0.875rem + 0.5vw, 1.125rem); }

Also: replace inline style="margin-bottom: 2rem;" in tool.html (7-8 occurrences) with .tool-section class.

Files: src/vibecheck/templates/base.html, tool.html
close_reason: Added spacing scale custom properties (--space-1 through --space-16) to :root. Replaced h1/h2 fixed sizes with clamp() fluid typography. Removed 768px h1 override. Added .tool-section class, replaced 5 inline margin-bottom styles in tool.html.

title: Unify card, tag, and button components across templates
description:
Component inconsistency is the biggest design issue (rated 6/10). Templates diverge from base vocabulary instead of extending it.

Cards - 4 incompatible variants:
- index.html .card: border-radius 12px, padding 1.5rem, hover lift
- bookmarks.html .bookmark-card: border-radius 8px, padding 1rem, no hover
- discover.html .swipe-card: border-radius 20px, padding 1.5rem
- Need: unified base .card with modifier classes (.card--compact, .card--interactive)

Tags - 3 incompatible definitions:
- base.html .tag: pill shape (999px radius)
- discover.html .tag: rounded rectangle (6px radius) with border
- articles.html: inline-styled community tag
- Need: one .tag with modifiers (.tag--accent, .tag--community)

Buttons - missing states:
- No :disabled state
- No :focus-visible ring
- No :active/pressed feedback
- Need: complete button state system

Files: src/vibecheck/templates/base.html, discover.html, bookmarks.html, articles.html, tool.html
close_reason: Added unified component system to base.html: .card--compact, .card--interactive modifiers; .tag--square, .tag--accent modifiers; complete button states (:disabled, :focus-visible, :active). Refactored bookmarks.html to use .card .card--compact.

title: Motion design refinements across all pages
description:
The Discover page has excellent motion design (8.5/10) but the rest of the site is flat. Specific refinements needed:

Fix in Discover:
1. Card entrance uses spring curve (overshoot) - wrong for entrance, use decelerate: cubic-bezier(0,0,0.2,1)
2. Harden entrance rAF timing - use forced reflow (card.offsetHeight) instead of fragile double-rAF
3. Remove !important from exit transforms - clear inline styles in completeSwipe() instead
4. Fix renderCards() timing: delay = speed * 1000 (not speed * 1000 - 50) to prevent flash

Add across site:
5. Replace transition: all with explicit property lists (performance)
6. Add standard easing: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) instead of default ease
7. Score counter scale pulse on increment
8. Empty state fade-up entrance animation
9. Search filter: opacity transition instead of display:none hard cut
10. Mode toggle: transition background-color on .mode-btn

Files: src/vibecheck/templates/base.html, discover.html
close_reason: Added easing custom properties (--ease-standard/decelerate/accelerate). Replaced all transition:all with explicit property lists. Fixed 4 Discover motion bugs: removed exit !important, replaced double-rAF with forced reflow, corrected entrance curve to decelerate, fixed timing jitter. Added fade-up animation for empty states, filter transition for search.

title: Replace emoji icons with SVGs
description:
Emojis used as functional icons render inconsistently across platforms and don't scale with font size.

Replacements needed:
1. Search box: .search-box::before { content: "üîç" } ‚Üí inline SVG magnifying glass
2. Tool eval status: ‚úÖ Works / ‚ùå Issues / üîÑ Actively Maintained ‚Üí CSS dot indicators or SVG icons
3. Discover action buttons: HTML entities (✕ ♥ ★) ‚Üí SVGs for reliable rendering
4. Warning/info indicators: ‚ö†Ô∏è ‚Üí SVG

Approach: Create a minimal inline SVG icon system. No icon font or sprite sheet needed - just inline SVGs in the templates with currentColor for theming.

Eval status indicator pattern:
.eval-status::before { content: ''; width: 8px; height: 8px; border-radius: 50%; background: currentColor; }
.eval-status--works { color: var(--success); }
.eval-status--issues { color: #f87171; }
